extendedInfo.description: Top Gear Cool Wall App Sponsored by Samsung/Phones 4UAnd now, it's time for the Cool Wall App... Now you can create your own Cool Walls, and rearrange the show Cool Wall itself. Using over 350 cars, you can place the cars where you think they should be on the Cool Wall and find out if the presenters think you've got it right in an audio sound bite. All the images of the cars are complete with stats. Be warned though, the car stats are highly suitable as slightly dodgy pub facts, but use sparingly when you need to win an argument. Where there was more than one model, we simply picked our favourite. For the most accurate stats, the car reviews section of www.topgear.com/uk/car-reviews is still the place to go.

reviews.title: Cool as ice!!
reviews.comment: Good app and superb. Love this feature on the show so yes... It\'s Sub Zero!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Quite good
reviews.comment: Could do with having bigger cards and a content library to rate cars qyickly and easily yourself.
reviews.author: Gary Dicker

reviews.comment: Its a great app but does it really need to take up nearly 30 mb of storage space
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pics too small, out of date & incomplete
reviews.comment: Missing classic cars from both UK & USA models and cats are out of date!  You wouldn\'t produce a t.v show that showed \"new\" cars when they were 5 years old! Invest time in this please! !
reviews.author: Vince Cannava II

reviews.comment: You can\'t do much except guess car ratings. Boring
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Jason
reviews.comment: Would be a cool app if it didn\'t keep for force closing!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: It\'s crap
reviews.comment: They ain\'t even done the cool wall right to start with 1 there\'s not viper and that is on the cool wall 2 they never thought the prius was a sub zero car why is it that when you create your own it still tells where it goes its supposed to be your own waste of time
reviews.author: Ryan Reed

reviews.title: Bored
reviews.comment: NEED AN UPDATE! THERE HAS NOT BEEN AN UPDATE FOREVER! PLEASE UPDATE!
reviews.author: Michael Shenton

reviews.title: Top Gear Cool Wall is...Cool...
reviews.comment: Ok forget the cheesy pun, in all fairness, this is a very decent time killer.  You man organize the already existent Cool Wall, make your own, and add your own cars to it. In fact, use this for more than just cars, sort out your Favorite TV Shows, Games, Movies, the possibilities are endless....
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Needs refurbished
reviews.comment: This app seems to take a grainy iPhone interface and put it in android so it looks terrible. Optimize it for android, make sliding from wall to wall smooth, make navigation smooth, make selection smooth. Also the pictures are all grainy it looks terrible. Make the pictures bigger once they are placed in the wall because your wasting about 95% of the walls space. All in all just optimize it and will be fine.
reviews.author: Matthew Smith

reviews.title: Good idea but...
reviews.comment: Its a good idea but lacking. If they added a few things such as a \'shuffle\' button so it selects a random car and then you decide where it goes that would be cool and if the cars were placed more logically on the wall instead of listing down vertically? Why? How about horizontal? If these two issues were addressed it would be a million times better. Oh and if they got rid of those stupid commentry captions for when you select a place for a car to go-Its my cool wall why are you telling me where to put cars?
reviews.author: Kieran Sprouse

reviews.title: Fun but freezes
reviews.comment: I enjoy playing with this app, but it freezes every time I use it and will need to be forced closed, I have reported the problem several times, but nothing has been done.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Uncool
reviews.comment: Poorly written. 46mb not 27. Cmon BBC, you can do better. Uninstalling
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Because it shows you the top gear coolwall and you can move the cars into the place that you want .it also shows you the specs of all the cars. It gives you something to do when your bored or when you just want to go on it , good for everyone.
reviews.author: Dylan Jones

reviews.title: Good but...
reviews.comment: Can\'t move to SD card. If this was fixed I\'d download it again.
reviews.author: George Davies

reviews.title: Not much
reviews.comment: Not much here. Just guessing if a car is cool or not. Also, the ui seems to be just like an Iphone which is confusing
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Pure rubbish can\'t make the same decision as top gear
reviews.author: mark mascoll

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Sud zero.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Never freaking works
reviews.comment: Every time I open this dang thing it stops working any where from a half a second to 45 seconds after I open it

reviews.title: Fun.
reviews.comment: It\'s pretty neat, just something to do when your bored. I like how when you rate cars it tells you how topgear rates it too.
